label: Elflines Online the Trading Card Game

Elflines Online Playing Cards.name: Elflines Online Playing Cards
Elflines Online Playing Cards.description: Cards meant to be used as part of playing Elfines Online The Trading Card Game.

Duel Caster.name: Duel Caster
Duel Caster.description: A plastic housing and card launcher for ELO Cards. ROF 3 if only weapon fired on your turn. Can also be loaded with normal playing cards but makes the weapon Poor Quality.

Scarlet Blackbow.name: Scarlet Blackbow
Scarlet Blackbow.description: A revitalized bow that must be reloaded after every attack. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the bow's battery pack explodes. Comes bundeled with a Quiver and 6 Rubber Arrows.

Sword of Arvish.name: Sword of Arvish
Sword of Arvish.description: A bladed, hilted weapon. Specifically designed for cutting or thrusting. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit Fail) the weapon crushes the wielder's fingers.
